ComicInfo.Title: Forever in this Halflife
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tommy ascends to the Throne of Odin and uses it to spy on the Oblivion world. Lord Oblivion catches him and obliterates his rocky body. Tommy, without either body now enters a dangerous crossroads. Saker shows up and helps guide Tommy. Releasing him from Monolith, so that it can seek out a new host and then helping Tommy to form a new body for himself. The two of them fly off to meet Lord Oblivion and a deal is struck.
Meanwhile, Vortex learns of the Nacht island invasion by the Oblivion forces. He begins to assemble a reconnaissance crew.
